Only the mods with special start options should appear below. 
  Standard Start: Begin as human, no special changes. 
  Children of Lilith: Triggers dream event. 
  Werewolves vs. Vampires: opens another event with options. 
  Futanari start option is the 'Trap' trait.

Only the mods with special start options should appear below. 
  Standard Start: Begin as human, no special changes. 
  Children of Lilith: Triggers dream event. 
  Werewolves vs. Vampires: opens another event with options. 
  Futanari: start as a futanari.

Werewolves vs Vampires options are: 
  Werewolf: Receive the trait and a random portrait. 
  Omega Male (human): Receive the character modifier. 
  Vampire: Receive the trait. 
  Vampire Thrall (human): Receive the character modifier.

Werewolves vs Vampires options are: 
  Werewolf: Receive the trait and a random portrait. 
  Werewolf Bitch (human): Receive the character modifier. 
  Vampire: Receive the trait. 
  Vampire Thrall (human): Receive the character modifier.

I weep over my child's now lifeless body. My child's short time was painful, as the werewolf and vampire blood war raged on inside of their small body. An unholy union of curses, claiming another innocent soul.
The blood war claims another life.
